plot: The Epidemic Z team plans to ratchet up the violence and gore already easily recognized as a staple in the zombie genre, thereby heightening the experience of the hardcore horror fan.
title: Epidemic Z
plot_es: The Epidemic Z team plans to ratchet up the violence and gore already easily recognized as a staple in the zombie genre, thereby heightening the experience of the hardcore horror fan.
plot_en: The Epidemic Z team plans to ratchet up the violence and gore already easily recognized as a staple in the zombie genre, thereby heightening the experience of the hardcore horror fan.
